function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of partial and full lockdowns on physical and mental health","Impact":"Negative impact on the well-being of individuals due to restricted movement and social isolation","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health support services, promote physical activity at home, and ensure regular communication with individuals in lockdown","Technologies":"Virtual fitness classes, telemedicine for mental health support, and digital communication platforms","People":"Citizens in lockdown","Owner":"Government and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Health crisis requiring better exchange of information on the mitigation of risks and national reporting of infection situation","Impact":"Lack of information exchange can lead to uncontrolled spread of the virus and ineffective response to the crisis","Mitigation":"Implement centralized information systems, enhance international cooperation on data sharing, and develop standardized reporting protocols","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, real-time tracking and monitoring systems, and electronic reporting tools","People":"Health authorities, government agencies, and international organizations","Owner":"Health authorities and international organizations"},{"Description":"Promoting the value of physical activities to overcome the consequences on citizens' well-being in times of COVID-19","Impact":"Lack of physical activity can lead to worsened physical and mental health outcomes in individuals","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate home-based exercise routines, provide online resources for physical activity, and promote the benefits of regular exercise","Technologies":"Online fitness platforms, mobile health apps for exercise guidance, and wearable activity trackers","People":"Citizens dealing with the impact of COVID-19","Owner":"Health and fitness organizations, as well as government initiatives"}]}
